item.title: About
item.description: I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science from Purdue University. I was affiliated with the Center for Education and Research in Information Assurance and Security (CERIAS). I’m currently interested in designing reliable and massively scalable distributed systems. Previously, I’ve worked on multiple areas of information security.

item.title: Code
item.description: rook (An Open, Cloud Native, and Universal Distributed Storage): Implemented the etcd manager to elastically expand and shrink the etcd cluster based on the cluster’s status. discovery service: Improved and expanded the etcd discovery service to reflect the latest cluster membership. distcron: A Distributed Cron.
